mapper.select: select seq,content from memo where e_number = #{e_number} and start_time <= #{date} and end_time >= #{date}
select seq,title from todo where e_number=#{e_number} and T_dateTime <= #{date} and T_endTime >= #{date} and state != '対応済'

select seq,catalog,date_format(runingTime,'%H:%i') as runingTime,date_format(endingTime,'%H:%i') as endingTime from facility where e_number=#{e_number} and runingTime <= #{lastTime} and runingTime >= #{date}
